text: The following is a list of deaths that should be noted in March 2020. For deaths that should be noted before the month that the world is in, please see "Months". Individuals listed must have notability. Names under each date are noted in the order of the alphabet by last name or pseudonym. Deaths of non- humans are noted here also if it is worth noting. Each listing of a death must have a source. If no reference is included, the death notice will be removed. The following are the requirements of adding a name to the list in its order: name, age, where they came from, what the person is known for, cause of death (if known) and a source. ==March== ===1=== Solentiname), theologian and Roman Catholic priest, heart and kidney disease. *John Currier, 66–67, American Coast Guard vice admiral, Vice Commandant of the U.S. Coast Guard (2012–2014).Decorated title: Deaths in March 2020
